key.name: window-width
key.summary: The saved width of the window.
key.description: The saved width of the window. Must be greater than 700, or it will not take effect.

key.name: window-height
key.summary: The saved height of the window.
key.description: The saved height of the window. Must be greater than 400, or it will not take effect.

key.name: window-state
key.summary: The saved state of the window.
key.description: The saved state of the window.

key.name: scrollback-lines
key.description: The number of scrollback lines of the terminal.

key.name: opacity
key.summary: The opacity of the terminal background.
key.description: The opacity of terminal background [0,100] 0 = complete transparent, 100 = completely opaque.

key.name: foreground
key.description: The color of the text of the terminal.

key.name: background
key.description: The color of the background of the terminal.

key.name: palette
key.description: Defines the colors of various things in the terminal.

key.name: shell
key.description: Defines the shell to be used by the terminal.

key.name: encoding
key.description: Defines the encoding to be used by the terminal.
